participant_1.background:

participant_2.background:
I spent a lot of time last year listening to The Muggers and trying to produce music myself.
i work as an interior designer.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I like to take care of my body and mind, but I don't let my appearance get in the way of my passions.
my favorite pass time is gazing at clouds.

content.text: Hello, my name is Hannah and I would like to get to know you better. What do you like to do for fun?
Hi Hannah, I work as an interior designer and I love playing music and spending time with my family.  What about you?
I am currently applying for publishing jobs and I love to play RPG computer games.  What is your favorite genre of music?
I am really into Indie and Folk music.  I also love to gaze at clouds. What is your favorite thing about RPG computer games?
I love the way that you can get lost in another world for hours and I also love the challenges that come with them.  How did you get into interior design?

My grandmother was an interior designer and I always loved helping her with her projects.  I decided to make it my career so I could help other people create beautiful spaces.  What is your dream job?
I would love to be a fashion designer, but I am afraid to tell my family because they are conservative.  I think that you are very brave to follow your passion.
Thank you so much, Hannah!  I am glad that you are so supportive.  You seem like a really great person and I am glad that we met.
